      means, collectively, each of Sprint Spectrum Depositor LLC, Sprint Spectrum Depositor II LLC, Sprint Spectrum Depositor III LLC, Sprint Intermediate HoldCo LLC, Sprint Intermediate HoldCo II LLC, Sprint Intermediate HoldCo III LLC, Sprint Spectrum
      PledgeCo LLC, Sprint Spectrum PledgeCo II LLC, Sprint Spectrum PledgeCo III LLC, Sprint Spectrum Co LLC, Sprint Spectrum Co II LLC, Sprint Spectrum Co III LLC, Sprint Spectrum License Holder LLC, Sprint Spectrum License Holder II LLC and Sprint
      Spectrum License Holder III LLC, their successors and assigns and any Subsidiary of the foregoing.</font></p>
  <p style="FONT: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; MARGIN: 0pt 0px">&#160;</p>
  <div style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP: 10pt" id="DSPFPageBreakArea">
    <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif; font-weight: normal; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-style: normal;" id="DSPFPageNumber">-14-</font>&#160;</div>
    <div style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always" id="DSPFPageBreak">
      <hr noshade="noshade" style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000"> </div>
  </div>
  <p style="FONT: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; MARGIN: 0pt 0px">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#8220;<i>Existing Sprint Spectrum Transaction</i>&#8221;
      means the transactions contemplated by the Existing Sprint Spectrum Financing Documents, including the issuance of any Existing Sprint Spectrum-Backed Notes.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#8220;<i>Existing Sprint Spectrum-Backed Notes</i>&#8221;
      means the Existing Sprint Spectrum Issuers&#8217; Series 2018-1 4.738% Senior Secured Notes, Class&#160;A-1, Series 2018-1 5.152% Senior Secured Notes, Class&#160;A-2, Series 2016-1 3.360% Senior Secured Notes, Class&#160;A-1, and any other note or series of notes issued
      under the Existing Sprint Spectrum Indenture from time to time.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#8220;<i>Existing Sprint Unsecured Notes</i>&#8221; means

      the Sprint Communications, Inc. Indenture, as supplemented by that certain Fifth Supplemental Indenture dated as of August&#160;14, 2012, between Sprint Communications, Inc. (formerly known as Sprint Nextel Corporation), and The Bank of New York Trust

      November&#160;14, 2012, between Sprint Communications, Inc. (formerly known as Sprint Nextel Corporation), and The Bank of New York Trust Company, N.A., as trustee, (vi)&#160;the 7.250% Notes due 2021 issued pursuant to the Sprint Corporation Indenture, as

      as supplemented by that certain Fifth Supplemental Indenture dated as of February&#160;22, 2018, among Sprint Corporation, Sprint Communications, Inc., as guarantor, and the Bank of New York Mellon Trust Company, N.A., as trustee.</font></p>

      Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, as trustee, (xii)&#160;the 5.300% Senior Notes due 2021 issued pursuant to the Base Indenture, as supplemented by that certain Twenty-Ninth Supplemental Indenture dated as of May&#160;9, 2017, among T-Mobile USA, Inc., the
      guarantors named therein and Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, as trustee (which were repurchased and canceled in connection with the Sprint Merger), (xiii)&#160;the 6.000% Senior Notes due 2024 issued pursuant to the Base Indenture, as supplemented
      by that certain Twenty-First Supplemental Indenture dated as of April&#160;1, 2016, among T-Mobile USA, Inc., the guarantors named therein and Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, as trustee, as supplemented further by that certain Thirtieth Supplemental

      trustee, (xv) the 4.750% Senior Notes due 2028 issued pursuant to the Base Indenture, as supplemented by that certain Thirty-Third Supplemental Indenture dated as of January&#160;25, 2018, among T-Mobile USA, Inc., the guarantors named therein and
      Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, as trustee, (xvi)&#160;the 4.500% Senior Notes due 2026-1 issued pursuant to the Base Indenture, as supplemented by that certain Thirty-Fifth Supplemental Indenture, dated as of April&#160;30, 2018, among T-Mobile USA,
      Inc., the guarantors named therein and Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, as trustee and (xvii)&#160;the 4.750% Senior Notes due 2028-1 issued pursuant to the Base Indenture, as supplemented by that certain Thirty-Sixth Supplemental Indenture, dated as
      of April&#160;30, 2018, among T-Mobile USA, Inc., the guarantors named therein and Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, as trustee.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#8220;<i>Financing Lease Obligation</i>&#8221; means, at
      the time any determination is to be made, the amount of the liability in respect of a financing lease that would at that time be required to be capitalized and reflected as a liability on a balance sheet prepared in accordance with GAAP.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#8220;<i>First Lien Debt to Cash Flow Ratio</i>&#8221;
      means, as of the last day of any period, the ratio of (a) (i)&#160;the Specified Consolidated Indebtedness of such Person as of such date that constitutes First Lien Obligations (including, in any event, the aggregate amount of Specified Consolidated
      Indebtedness constituting Permitted Spectrum Financings) less (ii)&#160;the aggregate amount of unrestricted Specified Cash Equivalents of the Company and its Subsidiaries as of such date to (b) the Specified Consolidated Cash Flow of such Person for such
      period.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">For purposes of making the computation referred
      to above, the First Lien Debt to Cash Flow Ratio, Specified Consolidated Indebtedness and Specified Consolidated Cash Flow shall be calculated on a Pro Forma Basis.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#8220;<i>First Lien Obligations</i>&#8221; means any
      Specified Indebtedness that is secured by Liens on the collateral that secures the Existing T-Mobile Secured Notes on a&#160;<i>pari passu</i>&#160;basis with the Liens that secure the Existing T-Mobile Secured Notes.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#8220;<i>First Priority Initial Spectrum Obligations</i>&#8221;
      means, collectively, the lease payments and all other obligations and liabilities of the Company and the Guarantors (including, without limitation, Post-Petition Interest), whether direct or indirect, absolute or contingent, due or to</font></p>
  <p style="FONT: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; MARGIN: 0pt 0px">&#160;</p>
  <div style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP: 10pt" id="DSPFPageBreakArea">
    <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif; font-weight: normal; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-style: normal;" id="DSPFPageNumber">-18-</font>&#160;</div>
    <div style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always" id="DSPFPageBreak">
      <hr noshade="noshade" style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000"> </div>
  </div>
  <p style="FONT: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; MARGIN: 0pt 0px">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0in; text-indent: 0in; text-align: justify"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">become due, or now existing or
      hereafter incurred, which may arise under, out of, or in connection with (i)&#160;the Initial Intra-Company Spectrum Lease Agreement and (ii)&#160;the Initial Spectrum Performance Agreement, in each case, whether on account of principal, lease payments,
      guarantee payments, interest, reimbursement obligations, fees, prepayment premiums, liquidated damages, indemnities, costs, expenses or otherwise (including, without limitation, all fees and disbursements of counsel that are required to be paid by
      the Company or any Guarantors pursuant to the terms of any of the foregoing agreements);&#160;<i>provided</i>&#160;that notwithstanding anything to the contrary in any documents or agreements (and regardless of any underlying actual amounts owing or
      outstanding), the total amount of the foregoing obligations that may constitute &#8220;First Priority Initial Spectrum Obligations&#8221; shall be limited to an aggregate amount not to exceed at any time $3,500,000,000.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#8220;<i>Fitch</i>&#8221; means Fitch Ratings, Inc. and
      its successors.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#8220;<i>Foreign Subsidiary</i>&#8221; means any
      Subsidiary of Parent other than a Subsidiary organized under the laws of the United States or any state of the United States or the District of Columbia.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#8220;<i>FSHCO</i>&#8221; means any Subsidiary of Parent
      that owns no material assets (directly or through Subsidiaries) other than Equity Interests (or Equity Interests and Specified Indebtedness) in one or more Foreign Subsidiaries that are CFCs.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#8220;<i>GAAP</i>&#8221; means generally accepted
      accounting principles as in effect on the date of any calculation or determination required under the Notes of this Series or the Indenture. Notwithstanding the foregoing, at any time, (i)&#160;the Company may elect to apply IFRS accounting principles in
      lieu of GAAP and, upon any such election, references herein to GAAP or parts of the Accounting Standards Codification or &#8220;ASC&#8221; shall thereafter be construed to mean IFRS (except as otherwise provided in the Indenture) and (ii)&#160;the Company, on any
      date may elect to establish that GAAP shall mean GAAP as in effect on such date;&#160;<i>provided</i>&#160;that any such election, once made, shall be irrevocable;&#160;<i>provided</i>,&#160;<i>further</i>, that any calculation or determination in the Indenture that
      requires the application of GAAP for periods that include fiscal quarters ended prior to the Company&#8217;s election to apply IFRS shall remain as previously calculated or determined in accordance with GAAP. The Company shall give notice of any such
      election made in accordance with this definition to the Trustee and the Holders of outstanding Notes of this Series.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#8220;<i>Governmental Authority</i>&#8221; means any
      nation or government, any state, province, territory or other political subdivision thereof and any other agency, authority, instrumentality, regulatory body, court, central bank or other entity exercising executive, legislative, judicial, taxing,
      regulatory or administrative powers or functions of or pertaining to government (including any supra-national bodies such as the European Union or the European Central Bank).</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#8220;<i>Governmental Authorization</i>&#8221; means any
      permit, license, authorization, plan, directive, consent, permission, consent order or consent decree of or from any Governmental Authority, including but not limited to FCC Licenses.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#8220;<i>Immaterial Subsidiary</i>&#8221; means any
      Subsidiary of the Company that at any time has Consolidated Total Assets accounting for less than 2.50% of the Company&#8217;s Consolidated Total</font></p>
  <p style="FONT: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; MARGIN: 0pt 0px">&#160;</p>
  <div style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP: 10pt" id="DSPFPageBreakArea">
    <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif; font-weight: normal; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-style: normal;" id="DSPFPageNumber">-19-</font>&#160;</div>
    <div style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always" id="DSPFPageBreak">

  </div>
  <p style="FONT: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; MARGIN: 0pt 0px">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0in; text-indent: 0in; text-align: justify"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">Assets;&#160;<i>provided</i>&#160;that the
      aggregate Consolidated Total Assets of all Immaterial Subsidiaries shall not at any time exceed 5.00% of the Company&#8217;s Consolidated Total Assets.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#8220;<i>Indebtedness</i>&#8221; means, with respect to
      any specified Person, without duplication, (1) any indebtedness of such Person (excluding accrued expenses and trade payables), whether or not contingent:</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in; background-color: white"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>

            agreements in respect thereof);</font></td>
